tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I should say that I was very fortunate to see Dr. Mari Senthilkumar for my dental cavity problem few days back. 

Actually, I had consulted another doctor before and was advised Root Canal Treatment (RCT) followed by having a dental crown for fixing my deep cavity. Obviously, that treatment will involve lot of money and multiple visits to the doctor.

But Dr. Mari Senthilkumar offered me to treat my problem conservatively first with a composite filling and said only if there are any issues, I have to go for the RCT and the Crown later. Within 45 minutes, he completed the permanent composite filling without much pain and also showed me clear pictures of my tooth before and after the procedure. The cost was also very nominal compared to other doctors. So far, I do not have any issues after the filling and feeling normal as the cavity is gone now.

So, I highly recommend this doctor to anyone having any dental problems for a correct diagnosis and also for a cost effective *** **** ********* in a city like Chennai.

Thank you doctor for your great service to patients.
reply_text: thank you for your valuable feedback sir . we will try to provide you more comfortable hospitality in future

review: I was always scared to visit a Dentist but this time couldn't hold back due to severe pain in the front teeth. As per neighbours suggestions visited Dr.Mari at Sri Sai Multispeciality Dental hospital. He thoroughly examined and explained the dental issues very clearly with possible/doable treatment options. Went with root canal treatment as per his suggestion and I'm satisfied with the treatment provided and cost wise also ita very reasonable. Dr.Mari is a patiently friendly doctor and a thorough professional & I would highly recommend him for any of your dental problems.

review: The way doctor explained the problem using live scanning video and his priority towards treating problems over money has to be appreciated (which is rare now-a-days). My mother had severe swelling in jaws due to infection. everything was properly analysed and handled patiently by the doc. I liked the way he patiently waited to observe my mom after removing the pus as she is a diabetic. Then he also said the things to be taken care of and further treatments required. overall a good experience and I recommend the doc to all who expect a genuine treatment with nominal fees.
